message:
Some people say it's not stable and causes security issues!

I need to install it (or anything else better) on my Galaxy S5 to it as a USB keyboard for Toshiba Libretto W100.

Any recommendations?

data.message: Keyboard is often a potential source of pain for using phones (and tablets for that matter). I know someone who got a small wireless keyboard to use with his phone, meaning INSTEAD of his phone's keyboard. I don't see any point in using the painful phone keyboard instead of the larger (read: better) PC keyboard.
